about_the_game:
Prepare for an elemental showdown like never before in Origin of Storms, a visually stunning fighting game that merges ancient powers, dynamic transformations, and team-based combat. Step into the shoes of Elemental Warriors, each wielding the raw might of fire, ice, lightning, and more.

Key Features:

🌪️ Elemental Mastery: Choose your warrior from seven distinct elemental classes, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Master the art of fire manipulation, control the flow of water, or harness the raw power of lightning as you embark on a journey through breathtaking arenas inspired by the diverse landscapes of the five kingdoms.

🔥 Beastly Transformations: Unleash the primal power of soul-bound weapons to transform into majestic beast-like creatures. These awe-inspiring forms not only alter your appearance but grant access to devastating abilities, turning the tide of battle in your favor.

🌐 Team-Based Combat: Engage in tactical one-on-one duels or assemble a formidable team of three Elemental Warriors. Coordinate attacks, exploit elemental synergies, and outmaneuver your opponents in intense team-based clashes.

🎮 Online Multiplayer: Challenge warriors from around the globe in intense online battles. Climb the ranks, earn exclusive rewards, and prove your elemental mastery in a fiercely competitive environment. Rollback netcode powered by GGPO.

📜 Compelling Story Mode: Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative-driven single-player experience. Follow the epic journey of Adelaida and her companions as they navigate the complexities of the multiverse, confronting possessed monarchs and unraveling the mysteries that bind the elemental realms together.

⚔️ Strategic Depth: Master the intricacies of elemental combat, exploiting weaknesses and crafting ingenious strategies. The game offers a perfect blend of accessible gameplay for casual players and strategic depth for hardcore enthusiasts.

👥 Character Customization: Showcase your unique style with a plethora of customization options, including skins, outfits, and accessories. Stand out on the battlefield as a true champion of the elements.

Immerse yourself in the elemental clash, where power, strategy, and personal flair define your destiny. "Origin of Storms" invites you to experience a spectacle of unparalleled excitement. Are you ready to become the ultimate champion in the arena?

content_descriptors.notes: Some character designs and skins will show some skin but nothing explicitly sexual.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Generation 5 Processor or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 900 series equivalent or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Dive into Origin of Storms, a visually striking fighting game where elemental warriors clash in one-on-one or dynamic three-on-three battles. Unleash primal transformations, master distinct elemental powers, and compete globally for supremacy in this electrifying arena. Are you ready for the storm?
